answers.answer: Hi, this sounds allot like fibromyalgia-you may want to take him to his pediatrician and ask about this and request to see a pediatric neurologist if you need a referral-if you don't need one I'd ask around to friends and family in order to find a reputable one.  They can have a long wait time for an appt so make it as soon as possible.  I'd have the pediatrician do a complete physical with bloodwork and you may want to also request blood testing to rule out diabetes.  Good luck.
